entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A rival student of Harry's, known for his arrogance and bad behavior.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: Harry's broomstick, which he uses to play Quidditch.

entities.name: bole
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is also the Beater for the Gryffindor Quidditch team.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Harry's twin brothers, who are also students at Hogwarts.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: A member of the Gryffindor Quidditch team.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: A member of the Gryffindor Quidditch team.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: A member of the Gryffindor Quidditch team.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: The teacher who is also the Head of the Gryffindor House at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Harry uses his broomstick, Firebolt, to play Quidditch.
Harry competes with Malfoy in a Quidditch match.
Bole throws a Bludger at Harry.
Harry is the brother of Fred and George.
Angelina is a member of the Gryffindor Quidditch team.
Alicia is a member of the Gryffindor Quidditch team.
Katie is a member of the Gryffindor Quidditch team.
Wood teaches Harry and is also his Head of House at Hogwarts.
